titles.title: To prohibit United States voluntary contributions to the regular budget of the United Nations or any United Nations agency.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/8/2013--Introduced. Prohibits funds made available to any federal agency for FY2014 and subsequent fiscal years from being used to make U.S. voluntary contributions to the regular budget of the United Nations or any U.N. agency.
